statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_finances;
SELECT candidate_name, contribution_amount, timestamp FROM campaign_finances;
SELECT * FROM campaign_finances WHERE id = 10;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM campaign_finances WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_finances ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_finances ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM campaign_finances GROUP BY candidate_name ORDER BY total_contributions DESC;
SELECT id, candidate_name, contributor_name, contribution_amount, timestamp FROM campaign_finances WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT contributor_name FROM campaign_finances ORDER BY contributor_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(DISTINCT contributor_name) AS unique_contributors FROM campaign_finances GROUP BY candidate_name ORDER BY unique_contributors DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, campaign_budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'John%' AND campaign_budget > 5000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_donations > 5 ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY candidate_name ASC
SELECT campaign_id, candidate_name, campaign_budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_donations > 10000

SELECT donations.campaign_id, campaigns.candidate_name, donations.donor_name FROM donations JOIN campaigns ON donations.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM campaign_finances;
SELECT campaign_name, funds_raised FROM campaign_finances WHERE funds_raised > 1000;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM contributors ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, funds_raised, expenses FROM campaign_finances WHERE expenses > funds_raised;
SELECT campaign_name, funds_raised, expenses FROM campaign_finances WHERE expenses > funds_raised;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM contributors ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount_spent > 500 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, funds_raised, expenses FROM campaign_finances WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%2021%' AND expenses < 1000;
SELECT contributor_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM contributors GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING total_contributions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT name, party_affiliation FROM candidates ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses WHERE date_paid = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE date_paid BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT contributor_id, amount, date_received FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY date_received ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions
SELECT contributor_id, amount FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY date_received DESC
SELECT name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic'
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY date_paid
SELECT * FROM campaign_finances WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, funds_raised FROM campaign_finances ORDER BY funds_raised DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_type, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_type;
SELECT issue_id, issue_type, issue_description FROM compliance_issues WHERE issue_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM campaign_finances ORDER BY funds_raised DESC, expenditures ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT candidate_name, funds_raised FROM campaign_finances WHERE funds_raised > 10000 AND candidate_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donors GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_donation > 5000
SELECT expense_type, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_type ORDER BY avg_expense DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
